name: Edgeguard Mech Arena
description:
Join the battle. Launch your enemies out of the arena. Be the last one standing!

Fight different enemy mechs in a series of matches, climb the ranks to finally meet the Mecha boss.

Use your charged attack to push enemies off the cliff while dodging their attacks. Use the environment to your advantage but remember: DO NOT FALL OFF THE EDGES!

In Edgeguard Mech Arena you can choose three different types of mecha and get to the battleground to fight enemies and face the powerful mecha boss.

SHOW ‘EM WHO IS THE BOSS! How to play

Use <WASD> to move and rotate.

Hold <SPACEBAR> to charge your attack and release it to thrust enemies.

Press <SHIFT> to dodge.

Credits

Game Design: Michele Panarelli, Giacomo Morabito, Alessandro Perelli.

Level Design: Giacomo Morabito, Michele Panarelli.

Programming: Alessandro Perelli, Michele Panarelli, JstPlink.

The full list of credits and assets used is in the game.

  1. Download Edgeguard Mech Arena.rar
  2. Extract it
  3. Double click on Edgeguard Mech Arena.exe
